q_en: What is the material with the highest remaining inventory?
gt:
Sure thing! Based on the data I have, the material with the highest remaining inventory is **Silk Pieces**. Here's a quick summary for you:

| Material ID | Material Name | Total Remaining Inventory |
|-------------|---------------|---------------------------|
| 6           | Silk Pieces   | 5,400                     |

Isn't it amazing how much Silk Pieces we have left? ðŸ˜„ If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT material_id, SUM(left_number) as total_left FROM warehouse_material GROUP BY material_id ORDER BY total_left DESC LIMIT 1;
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID and the remaining inventory quantity for each material

steps.sql: SELECT name FROM materials WHERE id = '6';
steps.description: Retrieve the name of the material with the highest remaining inventory
